content.raw:
I want to add velodyne sensors on WAM-V and I use the file from [velodyne_simulator](https://bitbucket.org/DataspeedInc/velodyne_simulator/overview)
I include the HDL32-E file into wamv-robotx.xacro file.
I can see the model and /velodyne_points, but there is no data in the topic 
and terminal which launches sandisand will not show "command timeout" and the number anymore.
content.html: I want to add velodyne sensors on WAM-V and I use the file from velodyne_simulator I include the HDL32-E file into wamv-robotx.xacro file. I can see the model and /velodyne_points, but there is no data in the topic and terminal which launches sandisand will not show "command timeout" and the number anymore.
